question: Will weekly jobless claims exceed 375K for the week ending on August 14?
description: This is a market on whether the number of Americans that file weekly jobless claims will exceed 375,000 for the week ending on Saturday, August 14, 2021. This market will resolve to “Yes” if the United States Department of Labor reports that there were more than 375,000 seasonally adjusted initial claims for unemployment insurance for the week ending on August 14, 2021. This market will resolve to “No” if the United States Department of Labor reports that there were 375,000 or less seasonally adjusted initial claims for unemployment insurance for the week ending on August 14, 2021.  The resolution source for this market will be the United States Department of Labor’s Weekly Uninsurance Claims report for the week ending on Saturday, August 14, 2021, expected to be released on Thursday, August 19, 2021, 8:30 AM ET. Resolution of this market will take place upon release of the aforementioned data. If data is not available for the aforementioned dates by Wednesday, August 25, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: What will the fully diluted market cap of SuperRare’s token be 1 week after it starts trading?
description:
This is a scalar market on what the fully diluted market cap of SuperRare’s token will be in USD 1 week after it begins being actively traded. The "fully diluted market cap" is determined by multiplying the price of the token by the total supply of tokens. The lower bound for this market is $250,000,000 and the upper bound is $3,000,000,000. The date by which the token is actively traded refers to the first date the token reaches over $10,000 in volume according to CoinGecko. The fully diluted market cap 1 week after this date, at 12:00 PM ET, will be used for this market’s resolution. For example, if the SuperRare token began actively trading on a Tuesday (in ET), the fully diluted market cap of the token would be checked at 12:00 PM ET the following Tuesday in order to resolve this market. If the total supply is infinite, the circulating supply/non-diluted market cap will be used instead to resolve this market. If the CoinGecko website is unavailable at the time of this check, or relevant data is unavailable on CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap will be used instead. If both CoinGecko and CoinMarketCap are down, or relevant data is unavailable, then another credible source will be chosen.

If SuperRare does not release a token by December 31, 2021, 11:59:59 PM ET, the market will resolve to $1,625,000,000, which is in between the lower and upper bounds of the market. 

You can use the calculator to the right (underneath the Buy modal) to calculate how each Long or Short Token price corresponds with SuperRare token’s fully diluted market cap value in USD. Long and Short shares will settle proportionally to the outcome value if the final value is between these bounds, but if the final value exceeds either the upper or lower bound, the price of each Outcome Token is capped at $1 and $0. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will a hurricane make landfall in the US lower 48 states before September 1?
description: This market shall resolve to "Yes" if a hurricane makes landfall in the conterminous United States by August 31, 2021, 11:59:59 PM ET, as reported in official National Hurricane Center advisories. If no tropical systems between the launch of this market, August 12, 2021, 2:00 PM ET, and August 31, 2021 are hurricane status at the moment of landfall in the conterminous United States, this market shall resolve to "No." For the purposes of this market, a hurricane landfall is said to occur when a hurricane's surface center intersects with the coastline, as described at https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/aboutgloss.shtml#LANDFALL. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Hikaru Nakamura win the 2021 St. Louis Rapid and Blitz Chess Tournament?
description: This market shall resolve to "Yes" if Hikaru Nakamura places 1st place in the 2021 St. Louis Rapid and Blitz Chess Tournament. Otherwise, the market will resolve to “No.” If the tournament is postponed to an end date on or before September 1, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If it is postponed to an end date after September 1, 2021, or is cancelled altogether, the market will resolve to “No.” In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Alexandra Botez/David Hoffman or Leighton Cusack/Cyrus Younessi win their Top Signal 2v2 chess match?
description: This is a market on whether Alexandra Botez and David Hoffman or Leighton Cusack and Cyrus Younessi will win Top Signal’s 2v2 chess match, set to take place on August 12, 2021 at 8 PM ET. More information can be found in this tweet https://twitter.com/BanklessHQ/status/1425195204814938114. If Botez and Hoffman win the match, this market will resolve to “Botez Hoffman.” If Cusack and Younessi win the match, this market will resolve to “Cusack Younessi.” If this match is declared a draw, each side will resolve to $0.50. If this match is for any reason postponed to a date on or before September 1, 2021, the same market resolution conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after September 1, 2021, or is cancelled altogether, each side will resolve to $0.50.  In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Kanye West’s album DONDA be released by August 20, 2021, 12:15 AM ET?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kanye West’s album DONDA is available for download or streaming (not including live events) on Apple Music on or before August 20, 2021, 12:15:59 AM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” The resolution source for this market will be Kanye West’s official Apple Music page, https://music.apple.com/us/artist/kanye-west/2715720. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will teams from the AFC or NFC win more games in the 2021 NFL Preseason Week 1?
description: This is a market on whether more games in Week 1 of the 2021 NFL Preseason will be won by teams in the AFC or in the NFC. For the purposes of this market, games for the 2021 NFL Preseason Week 1 will consist only of those NFL preseason games played between Thursday, August 12, 2021 and Sunday, August 15, 2021, inclusive. This market will resolve to "AFC" if, excluding intra-conference games (i.e., games between two AFC teams or between two NFC teams), teams in the AFC win more games in the NFL's Preseason Week 1 than teams in the NFC do. This market will resolve to "NFC" if, excluding intra-conference games, teams in the NFC win more games in the NFL's Preseason Week 1 than teams in the AFC do. This market will resolve 50/50 if, excluding intra-conference games, teams in the AFC and teams in the NFC win the same number of games. Membership in the AFC or NFC is determined according to the conference listings on the NFL webpage at: https://www.nfl.com/teams/. A current listing of games scheduled for NFL Preseason Week 1 is available on the NFL webpage at: https://www.nfl.com/schedules/ by selecting "2021" and "Preseason Week 1" from the drop-down menus. If a game currently listed on that schedule is rescheduled to a date after August 15, 2021, it will not be counted for the purposes of this market. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
